title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in a list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying it. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Modify 'aa' to 'aaa' in the list box and click OK directly.
6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter should be retained after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Modify 'aa' to 'aaa' in the list box and click OK directly.
6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
